text: DESC: Recited in last hours of 'Ashura Day
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha adama sifwati allahi
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha nuhin nabiyyi allahi
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha ibrahima khalili allahi
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha musa kalimi allahi
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha muhammadin habibi allahi
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha `aliyyin amiri almu'minina waliyyi allahi
alssalamu `alayka ya waritha alhasani alshshahidi sibti rasuli allahi
alssalamu `alayka yabna fatimata sayyidati nisaâ€˜i al`alamina
alssalamu `alayka ya khiyarata allahi wabna khiyaratihi
alssalamu `alayka ya thara allahi wabna tharihi
wa `ala arwahin hallat bifina'ika wa aqamat fi jiwarika
alssalamu `alayka minni ma baqitu wa baqiya allaylu walnnaharu
wa jalla almusabu fi almu'minina walmuslimina
fa'inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raji`una
wa salawatu allahi wa barakatuhu wa tahiyyatuhu `alayka
ya akha alshshahidi ya aba alshshuhada'i
salamu allahi `alayka wa rahmatu allahi wa barakatuhu
alssalamu `ala al`abbasi bni amiri almu'minina alshshahidi
alssalamu `ala alshshuhada'i min wuldi amiri almu'minina
alssalamu `ala alshshuhada'i min wuldi ja`farin wa `aqilin
alssalamu `ala kulli mustash-hadin ma`ahum min almu'minina
allahumma salli `ala muhammadin wa ali muhammadin
wa ballighhum `anni tahiyyatan kathiratan wa salaman
ahsana allahu laka al`aza'a fi waladika alhusayni
ahsana allahu laki al`aza'a fi waladiki alhusayni
ahsana allahu laka al`aza'a fi waladika alhusayni
ahsana allahu laka al`aza'a fi akhika alhusayni
wa likulli dayfin wa jarin qiran
an tas'ala allaha subhanahu wa ta`ala
an yarzuqani fakaka raqabati min alnnari
title: Ziyarah Taziyah
